skillTree.localised_description: Furtive, scheming, sly, cunning, underhand, devious, conniving, double-dealing, and sneaky - valuable traits if you wish to stay alive!
All Skaven are unprincipled and untrustworthy by their foul natures. However, this is rarely a disadvantage in the face of the enemy.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
If this unit can hide at its current location it will not be spotted until the enemy is very close.

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Darkness gathers about Fellpaw as he sprints into battle, a murky gloom that looms over any who dare to close with him.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

enabled_if: Unit is not attacking rear or flank

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

enabled_if: Unit is not attacking rear or flank

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

effects.description:
Ability: "Onrushing Shadow" for Shadow Rat Ogre units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: A pulsing, shadowy vortex surrounds Fellpaw, called from some mystical connection he has with the magic of the Eshin clan.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit is unable to activate abilities or cast spells.

skillTree.localised_description: Lesser children of shadow flock to Fellpaw, feeling in him a kindness and a kinship.

effects.description:
Leadership: +8 for Shadow Rat Ogre units
	(all units in army)

Attribute: Stalk for Shadow Rat Ogre units
	(all units in army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

skillTree.localised_description: Whatever foul deeds live within Fellpaw's past, they have made him remarkably resilient under certain circumstances.
The great wyrdstone comet of Mordheim amplifies Fellpaw's already impressive connection to twisted magics.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic cost: -20% for Lore of Stealth and Lore of Mordheim spells
	(Lord)

skillTree.localised_description: What Fellpaw is, where he stands in relation to the very fabric of the world, changes moment by moment.

ui_effects.localised_text: Grants one of the listed effects at random

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
Entities with this attribute ignore the effects of enemy contact effects such as  Poison

skillTree.localised_description: So much of war is an art. Over time and with much practice, combat moves can resemble a series of perfectly-rehearsed dance moves.
This being fights dirty, no honour system applies here!
"Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"
Whether a targeted slice to the throat, or a precision stab to the heart, this one knows how to kill!
"The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud â€“ these are the things that sustain me."
Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife inâ€¦
The harder they hit, the more they commit, the easier it is to strike back.
A drawn blade should not be put away until slaked in blood.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: How it happened is uncertain, but Skulk Fellpaw has been imbued with the very essence of the Lore of Stealth by a mad scientist, no doubt from Clan Moulder. And while the corruption has twisted much of his mind, he is more dangerous on the battlefield than he ever was before.
